verses.text: \w Open|strong="H6605"\w* \w your|strong="H6605"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, that \w the|strong="H6605"\w* fire may consume \w your|strong="H6605"\w* cedars!

\w Wail|strong="H3213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w cypress|strong="H1265"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cedar \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* majestic \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* \w are|strong="H7703"\w* \w ruined|strong="H7703"\w*! \w Wail|strong="H3213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* oaks \w of|strong="H3293"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dense \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* been cut \w down|strong="H3381"\w*!

\w Listen|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wailing|strong="H3215"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w glory|strong="H1347"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* ruins. \w Listen|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w thickets|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w are|strong="H7703"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Pasture|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* marked \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*,

whose buyers \w slaughter|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* remorse. \w Those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* say, ‘\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*!’ \w Even|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cause each man \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H4672"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* devastate \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w pastured|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* marked \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2028"\w*, especially \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* myself \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w staffs|strong="H4731"\w*, \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w Favor|strong="H5278"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* Union, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w pastured|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w one|strong="H1571"\w* \w month|strong="H3391"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* dismissed \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*. \w My|strong="H7462"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* grew \w impatient|strong="H7114"\w* \w with|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* flock, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* detested \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*. \w Let|strong="H7604"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w dying|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w perishing|strong="H3582"\w* perish; \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w let|strong="H7604"\w* those \w who|strong="H7604"\w* \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* \w devour|strong="H7462"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w another|strong="H7468"\w*’s \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.”

Next \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w staff|strong="H4731"\w* called \w Favor|strong="H5278"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w two|strong="H3947"\w*, revoking \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w had|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* revoked \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w watching|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* told them, “If \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w seems|strong="H2896"\w* \w right|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w give|strong="H3051"\w* \w me|strong="H3051"\w* \w my|strong="H2308"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* if \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, keep them.” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H8254"\w* \w my|strong="H2308"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*, \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Throw|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*”—\w this|strong="H3068"\w* magnificent \w price|strong="H3701"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w valued|strong="H3365"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w threw|strong="H7993"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w potter|strong="H3335"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w two|strong="H8145"\w* \w my|strong="H6565"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w staff|strong="H4731"\w* called Union, \w breaking|strong="H6565"\w* \w the|strong="H6565"\w* brotherhood between \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*: “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w up|strong="H7462"\w* \w once|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w equipment|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foolish \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w care|strong="H6485"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lost, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* young, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w sustain|strong="H3557"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w healthy|strong="H1277"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w devour|strong="H7462"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* choice \w sheep|strong="H6561"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w tear|strong="H6561"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w hooves|strong="H6541"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* worthless \w shepherd|strong="H7473"\w*, \w who|strong="H1945"\w* deserts \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*! \w May|strong="H2719"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* strike \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*! \w May|strong="H2719"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w completely|strong="H3001"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w utterly|strong="H3543"\w* blinded!”
